name: Source Collaboration Access Request
description: Notifies an administrator when they have a pending access request for a collaborator who is configuring a source
subject: $owner has requested the Source Configuration Assignee user level for $assignedUser
body:
Dear $adminUser,

$owner has requested the Source Configuration Assignee user level for $assignedUser so they can onboard the $referenceName source.

To grant this user level to $assignedUser, go to their identity and enable the Source Configuration Assignee user level.

This user level must be assigned to the user before they can begin onboarding this source. Contact $owner with any questions about this source or the assignee.


Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
